posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
Hello all.  After five years of work, I'm down to the final 42 T206's.  I'm looking for low grade examples (nothing above G/VG).  Graded or raw.  Poor cards are fine, even real beaters as long as they are intact.  

I have a bunch to trade including many short print and HOF T206s and T205s.  I will also buy if the prices are right.  Here's what I need:

COMMONS:

Burch (fielding)
Criger
Demmitt (New York)
Doolin
Elberfeld (portrait-New York)
Graham (St. Louis)
Hemphill
Kleinow (Boston)
Kleinow (catching-New York)
Kroh
Lake (ball in hand)
Lobert
Mullin (with bat)
Needham
Niles
Pfeister (seated)
Powell
Reulbach (no glove showing)
Wagner (bat on right shoulder)
Wilhelm (with bat)

SOUTHERN LEAGUERS

Bay
Foster
Helm
Hickman
Jordan
Kiernan
Lipe
Manion
Otey
Paige
Revelle
Seitz
Shaughnessy
C. Smith
Violat

HOF's

Evers (portrait)
Keeler (with bat)
Lajoie (throwing)
Mathewson (portrait)
Tinker (portrait)
Young (glove shows)
Young (bare hand)

Posted By: Matt
